name: Mirrors In Time
description:
Play a game that has been in development for only ONE WEEK

Mirrors in time is a strategy/puzzle video game that involves running around and fixing your ship. Mostly chill but challenging, this game takes you through a world of a spaceship suspended in the void.  Stuck near a black hole? Got weird time fluctuations making you doubt your sanity as you hear your past self interacting with things? This game's got it covered.
